title: Identity Theft & Fraud
description: Learn how to protect your identity

subtopic.name: What is Identity?
subtopic.detail: In the information sphere, your identity consists of your biographical data, biometric data, financial data, and your medical data.

subtopic.name: Identity Theft Vs. Fraud
subtopic.detail: To better understand how we put ourselves at risk, let’s examine the difference between identity theft and identity fraud.

subtopic.name: Methods of ID Theft
subtopic.detail: Identity thieves use many different strategies and methods to access your data. Let’s take a look at some of the most common and widely used methods!

subtopic.name: Identity Scams
subtopic.detail: Thieves often use scams to trick people to giving up their sensitive information. We’ll talk about some common scams,  and try to spot some of the red flags.

subtopic.name: Protecting Against ID Theft
subtopic.detail: What can you do to prevent an identity thief from stealing your information?

subtopic.name: What is a Credit Score?
subtopic.detail: A credit score is a 3-digit number that businesses use to learn how likely you are to repay any debts.

subtopic.name: Impact of Credit Scores
subtopic.detail: Let’s take a look at a scenario that shows us how a good credit score can be helpful while a bad one might get in the way of your financial goals.

subtopic.name: Credit Reports
subtopic.detail: It’s important to review your credit report regularly. It’s one of the ways to build and maintain good credit.

subtopic.name: Maintaining Healthy Credit
subtopic.detail: Maintaining Healthy Credit

subtopic.name: Credit Repair Scams
subtopic.detail: Repairing your credit can be an emotional process and there are many agencies that may try to scam you as you work towards your goal.

subtopic.name: Retirement Readiness
subtopic.detail: In order to have financial security when you are no longer working, you need to develop and implement a retirement savings plan as early as possible.

subtopic.name: Income Sources
subtopic.detail: Retirement income could come from a variety of sources. There are many options available to you, especially if you plan ahead and choose options that may be the most useful for you.

subtopic.name: Saving & Planning Strategies
subtopic.detail: Planning for retirement means you’ll need to save as well as invest. Develop a strategy to maximize your retirement income!

subtopic.name: Types of Plans
subtopic.detail: Most retirement plans are composed of a preset choice of investment options such as mutual funds, which are often made up of stocks and bonds.

subtopic.name: Investments
subtopic.detail: Invest directly in stocks and bonds, or a diversified combination of several options.

subtopic.name: Understanding Mortgages
subtopic.detail: Getting a mortgage doesn’t have to be an anxiety-ridden process. Let’s get started and understand what a mortgage really is.

subtopic.name: Common Costs
subtopic.detail: Let’s identify and define costs associated with a mortgage that you need to be thinking about.

subtopic.name: Budgeting for a Mortgage
subtopic.detail: Making a budget and planning carefully for a mortgage can make it easier to manage and pay off effectively.

subtopic.name: Types of Mortgages
subtopic.detail: Some mortgages are fixed, and others are adjustable. It’s like comparing apples and oranges!

subtopic.name: Getting a Mortgage
subtopic.detail: There are many places where you can go to get a mortgage.
